name: Pomodoro
des: A web app that connects to Evernote and helps users get their work done using Pomodoro.

name: SummonCobot
des: An android app that summons cobot in Gates Center. A major project in CMU Cobot Lab. Server written in Python Flask.

name: Pokemon3D
des: 3D Pokemon game in Panda3D. 15-112 Term Project.
